title: Ticket #1736: startd segfault receiving job classad update
description:
In CHTC, I observed a startd crash with the following log: 

10/27/10 07:47:54 slot8: in starter:killHard starting kill timer
10/27/10 07:47:54 Return from Timer handler 96470 (Claim::leaseExpired)
10/27/10 07:47:54 Calling Handler <receiveJobClassAdUpdate> (13)
10/27/10 07:47:54 slot8: Received job ClassAd update from starter.
Stack dump for process 28239 at timestamp 1288183674 (15 frames)
condor_startd(dprintf_dump_stack+0xb7)[0x560e2a]
condor_startd[0x561096]
/lib64/libpthread.so.0[0x358d60eb10]
condor_startd(_ZN6Client10setNumPidsEi+0x12)[0x4f812e]
condor_startd(_ZN5Claim14loadStatisticsEv+0x3b)[0x4fa5d9]
condor_startd(_ZN5Claim23receiveJobClassAdUpdateERN14compat_classad7ClassAdE+0x181)[0x4fafe1]
condor_startd(_ZN7Starter23receiveJobClassAdUpdateEP6Stream+0x11a)[0x51569c]
condor_startd(_ZN10DaemonCore24CallSocketHandler_workerEibP6Stream+0x278)[0x549208]
condor_startd(_ZN10DaemonCore35CallSocketHandler_worker_demarshallEPv+0x39)[0x54944f]
condor_startd(_ZN13CondorThreads8pool_addEPFvPvES0_PiPKc+0x3f)[0x5f063d]
condor_startd(_ZN10DaemonCore17CallSocketHandlerERib+0x341)[0x53a8b9]
condor_startd(_ZN10DaemonCore6DriverEv+0x18c4)[0x53c210]
condor_startd(main+0x1aa8)[0x554dd2]
/lib64/libc.so.6(__libc_start_main+0xf4)[0x358ca1d994]
condor_startd(__gxx_personality_v0+0x489)[0x4f74b9]

The startd received a job update after the claim lease expired and therefore right after it had hard-killed the starter. Perhaps there is a pointer left behind that is pointing to something which has been deleted.

I don't know for sure that this problem only affects 7.5.4+. It may affect earlier versions.
